verbs.description: There [V: is] [ARG1: a growing concern that President Donald Trump 's decision to withdraw the United States from the Iran deal , formally the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Act]
There is a [V: growing] [ARG1: concern] that President Donald Trump 's decision to withdraw the United States from the Iran deal , formally the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Act
There is a growing concern that President Donald Trump 's decision to [V: withdraw] [ARG1: the United States] [ARG2: from the Iran deal] , [ARGM-MNR: formally the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Act]
